thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Carlyle Earnings Boosted by Investment Growth and Fees

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Carlyle Earnings Boosted by Investment Growth and Fees
text:
Carlyle Group LP posted a fourth-quarter profit, helped by an upswing in fee-related earnings and strong growth in the value of its investments.
For the three months ended Dec. 31, the Washington, D.C., asset manager reported earnings of $52.9 million, or 49 cents a share. That compares with a loss of $8.9 million, or 16 cents a share, in the year-earlier quarter.
Economic...
